Game

Class ErlController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.ErlController

  • public class ErlController
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a messagepassing link between java and erlang processers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErlController(World world) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Sends an "exit" atom to erlang node for closing down all erlang processes.
      com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpMbox getMbox()
      Mainly used for testing.
      void kill(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangPid loserPID, com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangPid winnerPID)
      Sends results from a Battle between 2 Char objects to erlang processers by killing one and unfreezing one.
      void move(java.lang.String direction)
      Sends movement directions for erlang process.
      void run()
      Initialize a thread with a "erlang listener", messages such as "human", "battle" and "move" for visualization of event update accured in erlang.
      void setMainPID(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpMbox mbox)
      Mainly used for testing.
      void setPlayerPID(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpMbox mbox)

        public void run()
        Initialize a thread with a "erlang listener", messages such as "human", "battle" and "move" for visualization of event update accured in erlang.
